contentrichtext.text: {{Starbox short | name = Xi Aurigae | epoch = [[J2000]] | constell = [[Auriga (constellation)|Auriga]] | ra = {{RA|05|54|50.78082}}<ref name=aaa474_2_653/> | dec = {{DEC|+55|42|25.0084}}<ref name=aaa474_2_653/> | spectral = A2 V<ref name=aj74_375/> | appmag_v = +5.00<ref name=clpl4_99/> | dist_ly = {{nowrap|238 ± 5}} | dist_pc = {{nowrap|73 ± 1}}<ref name=aaa474_2_653/> | names = 30 Aurigae, [[Bonner Durchmusterung|BD]]+55 1027, [[Fifth Fundamental Catalogue|FK5]] 1157, [[Henry Draper Catalogue|HD]] 39283, [[Hipparcos catalogue|HIP]] 27949, [[Harvard Revised catalogue|HR]] 2029, [[Smithsonian Astrophysical Observatory catalogue|SAO]] 25450.<ref name=SIMBAD/> }} '''Xi Aurigae''' (ξ Aur, ξ Aurigae) is the [[Bayer designation]] for a [[star]] in the northern [[constellation]] of [[Auriga (constellation)|Auriga]]. This star was once considered part of the constellation of [[Camelopardalis]] and held the [[Flamsteed designation]] '''32 Camelopardalis'''.<ref name=wagman18/> It is visible to the naked eye with an [[apparent visual magnitude]] of +5.0.<ref name=clpl4_99/> The measured annual [[parallax]] shift of this star is {{nowrap|13.69 ± 0.28 [[milliarcsecond|mas]]}},<ref name=aaa474_2_653/> which corresponds to a physical distance of {{Convert|238|ly|pc|abbr=off|lk=on}} with a 5 light-year [[margin of error]]. This is an [[A-type main sequence star]] with a [[stellar classification]] of A2 V.<ref name=aj74_375/> ==References== {{reflist|refs= <ref name=aaa474_2_653>{{citation | first1=Floor | last1=van Leeuwen | month=November | year=2007 | title=Validation of the new Hipparcos reduction | volume=474 | issue=2 | pages=653–664 | bibcode=2007A&A...474..653V | arxiv=0708.1752v1 | doi=10.1051/0004-6361:20078357 | journal=Astronomy and Astrophysics | postscript=. }} ''Note:'' see VizieR catalogue [http://vizier.u-strasbg.fr/viz-bin/Cat?I/311 I/311].</ref> <ref name=clpl4_99>{{citation | last1=Johnson | display-authors=1 | first1=H. L. | last2=Iriarte | first2=B. | last3=Mitchell | first3=R. I. | last4=Wisniewskj | first4=W. Z. | title=UBVRIJKL photometry of the bright stars | journal=Communications of the Lunar and Planetary Laboratory | volume=4 | issue=99 | year=1966 | bibcode=1966CoLPL...4...99J }}</ref> <ref name=aj74_375>{{citation | display-authors=1 | last1=Cowley | first1=A. | last2=Cowley | first2=C. | last3=Jaschek | first3=M. | last4=Jaschek | first4=C. | title=A study of the bright A stars. I. A catalogue of spectral classifications | journal=Astronomical Journal | volume=74 | pages=375–406 | month=April | year=1969 | doi=10.1086/110819 | bibcode=1969AJ.....74..375C | postscript=. }}</ref> <ref name=SIMBAD>{{citation | title=ksi Aur -- Star | work=SIMBAD Astronomical Database | publisher=Centre de Données astronomiques de Strasbourg | url=http://simbad.u-strasbg.fr/simbad/sim-id?Ident=Xi+Aurigae | accessdate=2012-08-20 | postscript=. }}</ref> <ref name=wagman18>{{citation | last=Wagman | first=M. | title=Flamsteed's Missing Stars | journal=Journal for the History of Astronomy | issue=3 | volume=18 | page=213 | month=August | year=1987 | bibcode=1987JHA....18..209W }}</ref> }} ==External links== * [http://webviz.u-strasbg.fr/viz-bin/VizieR-S?HR%202029 HR 2029] * [http://aladin.u-strasbg.fr/AladinPreview?-c=05+54+50.7821%2B55+42+25.008&ident=*+ksi+Aur&submit=Aladin+previewer Image Xi Aurigae] {{Stars of Auriga}} [[Category:Henry Draper Catalogue objects|39283]] [[Category:Hipparcos objects|027949]] [[Category:Bayer objects|Aurigae, Xi]] [[Category:Auriga (constellation)]] [[Category:A-type main-sequence stars]] {{star-stub}} {{main-star-stub}}
